def InitializeRow(entity, row): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.GestaoDeProjetos import GPApontamentos
tarefaConcluida = GPApontamentos.TarefaApontamentoConcluida(entity.ApontamentoHandle)
if row.EditCommand != None: row.EditCommand.Visible = entity.PermiteManterAnexos and not tarefaConcluida if row.DeleteCommand != None: row.DeleteCommand.Visible = entity.PermiteManterAnexos and not tarefaConcluida

def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.GestaoDeProjetos import GPProjetoTarefas
if widget.ProviderWidget.Entity.TarefaHandle.IsInvalid: return
tarefaConcluida = GPProjetoTarefas.TarefaConcluida(widget.ProviderWidget.Entity.TarefaHandle)
if widget.View.Commands["New"] != None : widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = widget.ProviderWidget.Entity.PermiteManterApontamentos and not tarefaConcluida
